content: Have you perhaps tried to add a signature? That is a RIFF file that is being included in the message as text. A signature in a file is the most logical source of that.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: You have the quick filter bar set to only show unread emails with attachments. Try turning those to filters off (click on them so the blue goes grey)
creator: MattAuSupport

content: be sure to have 'accept cookies' set in setting>privacy&security - and be sure to NOT enter password until google asks for it.
